original_text: and those who deal with the world as though they had no dealings with it. For the present form of this world is passing away.
korean_text: 세상 물건을 쓰는 자들은 다 쓰지 못하는 자 같이 하라 이 세상의 외형은 지나감이니라

sentences.original_text: and those who deal with the world
as though they had no dealings with it.
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 세상과 상관이 없는 것처럼 행동합니다.

sentences.original_text: For the present form of this world
